flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this tutorial, I'm going to show how to make your own fire piston. I'll do my best, but this tutorial will not be able to cover every single aspect...It will only cover the general steps and dimensions. There is lots of information online about the fire piston, so I recommend you get some background info before doing this project.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this tutorial, I'm going to show how to make your own fire piston. I'll do my best, but this tutorial will not be able to cover every single aspect...It will only cover the general steps and dimensions. There is lots of information online about the fire piston, so I recommend you get some background info before doing this project.

Relevant parts
  • Copper tubing
  • Endcap
  • Solder
  • Dowel
  • O-ring gasket
Tools
  • Butane torch
  • Metal files
  • Pipe cutter
  • Sandpaper
guide.summary: This project will explain the process of making a mysterious and mostly forgotten fire starting device used by primitive man.
guide.title: Primitive Fire Piston  (w/ video demonstration)
